variation.name: 220-01-NonStandardArcroleCycle.xsd
variation.description: A cycle between arcs in a non-core extended link, and non-core arcs.

variation.name: 220-02-NonStandardArcWithUndefinedArcrole.xsd
variation.description: Cycle in custom arc with arcrole URI that isnt defined in an arcroleRef or arcroleType. Cycles should be OK.

variation.name: 220-03-CycleInUnreferencedArcrole.xsd
variation.description: ArcroleType and linkbase in same file, linkbase doesnt reference arcroleType which prohibits cycles. We have a cycle.

variation.name: 220-04-StandardArcWithUnreferencedArcrole.xsd
variation.description: Arcrole defined in same file as linkbase where it is used, but with no arcroleRef. Should require arcroleRef.

variation.name: 220-05-UsedOnSignificanceOnCustomArc.xsd
variation.description: Custom arcrole type with usedOn of presentationArc. Referenced and used on a non-standard arc. Should get error according to 5.1.4.5.

variation.name: 220-06-Change of error depending on DTS
variation.description: Individually linkbases are valid, but putting them together is undefined. Should we report the cycles?

variation.name: 220-07-Change of error depending on DTS
variation.description: Test of just linkbase1. It has the cycle, but no arcrole ref.

variation.name: 220-08-Change of error depending on DTS
variation.description: Test of just linkbase1. It has the cycle, but no arcrole ref. Yet we add the arcrole type definition to the DTS.
